channel.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/usXyc5v.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Base: Asteria 3.0 | Original Avarrocka Client.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[COLOR=#ab7e5b]Our forums have been released, feel free to [/COLOR][url=http://avarrockaps.com/forums/]check it out![/url]
To view all the updates that have been made until now i'd urge you to view this thread; [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/611462-asteria-3-0-avarrocka-comeback.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/611462-asteria-3-0-avarrocka-comeback.html[/url]
[HR]
[table][tr][td] [LEFT][img]http://i.imgur.com/Mk6ztiB.png[/img][size=3][i] Journey to the world of [b]Avarrocka[/b]! Avarrocka is a 317 RSPS that is packed with high quality content. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE encounters that helps foster our player-driven economy. Avarrocka can simply be defined as 'unique'. For example we have a guild system that is truly meaningful and rewarding. The concept surrounding Avarrocka is one of a kind and the design (down to the smallest details) is incredible.[/i][/size][/LEFT][/td][/tr][/table]
[LEFT][img]http://i.imgur.com/G0dG1EG.png[/img][size=3][i] At Avarrocka we strive to deliver uniquely distinct & diverse content. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with unique content of the highest quality. Our outstanding staff team will quickly amend any issue you may have on your adventures.[/i][/size][/LEFT]
[LEFT][img]http://i.imgur.com/d0FB2AT.png[/img][size=3][i] We are consistently adding improvements to Avarrocka, so that it can be the best and most modified, yet stable server in existence. We're also much more inclusive than your average online destination. Avarrocka is for gamers of every breed; new members are the fiber that binds our community, so we welcome them warmly! Our focus is around our members, and the staff team works tirelessly to ensure that everyone enjoys their experience.[/i][/size][/LEFT]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=#ab7e5b][I][FONT=Georgia]I remember the way. I go north to go south, east to go west, back to go forward. And to touch the light I have to pass beneath the shadow of true destiny.[/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[HR]
[table][tr][td] [B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b][U]Development keys:[/U][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#FF0000]Hasn't been started[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFD700]Currently in progress[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Finished[/COLOR][/ul] [/td][/tr][/table]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b][U]Development team:[/U][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/hacker/]Chris[/URL] - Game Developer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/stanaveli/]Stan[/URL] - Game Developer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/GoLang/]Jay[/URL] - Game Developer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Artem - Credits[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/Snijder/]Dennis[/URL] - Web Developer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/bubletan/]Rob[/URL] - Assistant Developer[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b][U]Community team:[/U][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/royal/]Royal[/URL] - Community Manager.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/seppe/]Seppe[/URL] - Administrator.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ab7e5b][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/element+34/]Matt[/URL] - Administrator.[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b][U]Goal:[/U][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[B][I][COLOR=#ab7e5b]At Avarrocka we strive to deliver uniquely distinct & diverse content. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our unique and friendly community with unique content of the highest quality. Our outstanding staff team will quickly amend any issue you may have on your adventures.[/COLOR][/I][/B]
[HR]
[SIZE=3][B][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Official Development Log:[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[CODE] * Avarrocka project resumed. * Added new texture system. * Fixed model decoder. * Added model texturing. * Fixed a client networking issue. * Finished converting the commands to java. * Addded support for producing/deducting multiple items when using the producing skill action class. Completed the process for creating finished and unfinished potions. * Increased the delay formula for the potion creation classes. Added an animation command. Completed herb identifying. * Added support for usergroups and redone the commands pattern. Not finished converting the commands though. * Added compability to connect to the Avarrocka client. * Fixed the user groups and added a new commands system which has a proper dispatcher and skeleton classes for further utilization. This works properly with the user groups. * Converted all the commands to the new command system. * Minor improvements to the command dispatcher. * Implemented a server sided file system. * Implemented a server sided file system(update). * Added the missing utilities for the file system io. * Started on object definition and object definition parser. * Added a file system bootstrap to the game builder. * Added the bzip2 library. * Added the forced movement mask and fixed an issue with item spawning. * Start of the Agility system, needs testing and fixing for obstacle types. * Added the wilderness jump and fixed a small issue with the forced movement mask. * Implemented the old forced movement class from wildercress so it can be fixed properly. * Finished herblore creation of unfinished and finished potions. * Fixed problems with the producing skill action and fixed issues with creating potions and added tar creation. * Start on woodcutting. * Further continuation on woodcutting. * Finished woodcutting. * Start on mining. * Added the huge cache to the data folder. * Implementation of: [LIST] [*] Region system(only for object now). [*] Traversal map system. [*] Pathfinding (with three pathfinders). [*] Player following clipped. [/LIST] * Reformatted all the classes. * Finished mining. * Finished runecrafting. * Finished grindable items. * Start on fishing. * Updates regarding prayer, wc, mining, fishing and items. * Fixed error regarding prayer bone altar. * Mining adjustments. * New hitmarks with critical hit support. * Minor fixes. * Moved the forced movement class, some design updates made to the forced movement class. * Agility system design completed. * Support for higher revision identikit. * Agility updates. * Design fixes regarding agility. * Added sound command for testing and fixed accepting appearances. * Further progression on agility. * New agility design system. * Added a few new commands. * Further improvement on the agility design. * Added a Cancel Policy for skills which will take care of interactions while skilling. * Fixed Minimap clicking. * Heights fix. * Agility updates, completed gnome agility course, start on barbarian course. * Obstacle failing is more modular now, I've fixed the issue with forced movements on obstacle actions. * Further continuation on barbarian course. * Some changes to the agility system and completed the barbarian agility course. * Restarted writing agility.. (again) * Finished the Agility System, completed Gnome agility course. * Further continuation on the agility system, completed advanced gnome agility course except the pole swing because it's too damn complicated. * Renamed the agility class, modifactions to forced movement. * Started on the barbarian outpost agility course. * Completed Barbarian outpost agility course. * Fixed issue with Crumbling walls, and rewrote a message. * Finished advanced barb courses, start on wilderness course. * Added lare's fishing.. * Fixed the run-up wall for barb course. * Finished Wilderness Course except the last obstacle because animation is buggy (model precision?). * Added firemaking, fixed herblore and added a new utility method for skill actions. * Skill actions now support animations which are executed instantly rather then periodically. * Home button teleport has been added. * Firemaking delay fix and fix for walking west. * Started on a thieving system, completed thieving from stalls. * Item on item fix, added thieving stalls and pickpocketing. * Moved the fight caves classes. * Added support for spawning npcs for player. * Added the pole swing to the advanced gnome course. * Started on barrows and added an utility for item sets. * Added support for digging, further continuation on barrows. * Moved drop and pickup sounds to the correct classes. * Removed old pickup/drop sounds. * Extended skills support to dungeoneering, summoning, hunter and farming. * Skilling adjustements, new Priority flag for skilling. * Finished fletching. * Fixed agility checks. * Fixed the cancel policy's for skills. * Fixes for item on item skills, finished fletching, only bolt creating is left. * Fletching fixes. * Added running. [/CODE]
[HR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JQl5a67.png[/img][/CENTER]
[INDENT][I][SIZE=3]Combat can either make or break a private server and here at Avarrocka, we will not stand for just adequate combat like ALL other private servers, we will provide the ultimate combat experience in both Player Verses Player instances and Player Verses Monster instances.[/SIZE] [/I][/INDENT]
[table][tr] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/wIeG06Q.png[/img][B][SIZE=3] Melee[/SIZE][/B] [ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Accuracy/max hit formula[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFD700]Correct animations, delays[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFD700]Special attacks[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Barrelchest anchor[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon dagger[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Abyssal whip[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon longsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon mace[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon halberd[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Dragon claws[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Granite maul[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon spear[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Armadyl godsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Bandos godsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Zamorak godsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Saradomin godsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Saradomin sword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Statius's warhammer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Vesta's longsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Guthan's effect[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Torag's effect[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dharok's effect[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Verac's effect[/COLOR][/list][/ul] [/td]

[INDENT][I][SIZE=3]Skilling is a fundamental asset for all private servers and here at Avarrocka, we are dedicated toward emulating all skills precisely to match RuneScape's data. From that point, we plan to take skilling a step further by implementing even more features for our community to enjoy.[/SIZE] [/I][/INDENT]

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!

item.description:
@Avarrocka_PS wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:13, topic:554256”]You’re more similar to Artem than anyone thought then, because there’s that old chip on the shoulder. There’s no need to be stubborn, no one’s being an asshole they’re just pointing you in what will be a better direction.

Also with your team of friends, apparently there’s only one guy doing the work according to the Rune-Server thread, one guy is MIA for weeks with no-one hearing from him and the other guy is out of action. I’m not here to flame you whoever you are, Mopar isn’t full of these flamey monsters everyone makes us out to be we just don’t butter you up. We’ve made your mistakes, we’ve fudgeed the same things you have in the past and we point you in the direction of how not to make the same mistakes.

The issue is, people like yourself come along with this inflated sense of achievement and self worth and the second we tell them they’re wrong they kick up a 9000 word dissertation on why they’re right and we’re wrong and all that jazz.

I’m not here to argue with anyone, I done all of my RSPS stuff about 4 years ago and couldn’t really care where it’s going now. I was just trying to save you making some mistakes, but obviously you and your highly trained team of java assassins know better than anyone else in the world and will create your vision and FINALLY MAKE AVAROCKA WHAT ITS REALLY WORTH.

Prove me wrong. If you post another retarded “perhaps you should read this” reply I’ll lose all faith in humanity.[/quote]

Perhaps you should read…

Just kidding, i’m that guy who you’ve stated is the only one working on the server, and as I said on that thread it’s not just me. Also you didn’t respond to my question when I asked you what the unrealistic goals were that you where talking about.

Thanks for believing in us though, not many like you on this community.

Some updates from Jay.

[ul][]Combat now has support for Hit Delays.
[]Glassblowing has been completed.
[*]Gem cutting has been completed.[/ul]

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
item.dc:creator: @Avarrocka_PS Avarrocka PS
item.description:
@Avarrocka_PS wrote:

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=673180.msg4501816#msg4501816 date=1451945384]
I don’t see this succeeding for many reasons, first of all you’re setting massively unrealistic goals. [/QUOTE]

What are these unrealistic goals we’ve set? If you’re talking about the red parts in the OP that we’ve not completed, you should perhaps read my previous post.

[QUOTE]Avarrocka was much better left in the past, Artem was a nice dude if he knew you but he had a MASSIVE chip on his shoulder and thought he was better than almost everyone unless they stood out in a certain community. The name has a whole host of drama following it. [/QUOTE]

That’s your opinion, as I stated before I will do my best to make Avarrocka what it’s really worth, I’ve been getting massive support besides from this forum which I found a pity because I really thought there were awesome members here.

[QUOTE]Make something that’s yours. Make it with realistic goals. Make it with a realistic team size. Literally just work hard and stay humble and things will fall into place, if you try to revive something that’s coated in shit and been resurrected more times than fred the crash test dummy then you’re going to get absolutely no respect from anyone who is anyone.[/QUOTE]

This is ours, we have realistic goals set (According to our standards), we have a realistic team size, everyone in the team i’ve known for atleast a good year and I know if I trusted them with something, I’d get it back if I asked for it. They have done their best and so have I. None of us is being paid, we don’t fudge around. Where many would stab each others back for the money, we would throw it away and help each other to get back up. Then again your theory about reviving something what is coated in shit is your opinion which you could have left out because I found it offensive in many ways when we’re actually doing our best.

[QUOTE]Also for some reason I know this dudes name and not in a good way, I’m sure someone with that name was stealing my shit a while back. People change blah blah.[/QUOTE]

Back it up with facts, don’t throw some rumours around which may not be true.

[QUOTE]People don’t need an amazing server with 6 million features and unique content, what they need is a stable server that goes like a train and the updates come when they say they’ll come. Not so much feature or content update, just general maintenance and small tweaks. That was all I done with my server when we were hitting 800/900 players, fair enough that was like 3/4(?) years ago now and there were more people around but I don’t know a thing about java, just listen to the community and tweak what they ask when they ask and people stay. They don’t need anything special.[/QUOTE]

Then again this is your opinion, I don’t need to know your history or experience when it comes to RSPS when your first going to trash-talk the project you’re trying to give constructive criticism to.

Thanks for the criticism nonetheless.

We will still continue to pursue our dream. As I stated before, I will do my best to make Avarrocka what it’s really worth. Humbleness isn’t what it takes to be the best, just look at Ikov, nothing what they have done was humble (Hiring hackers, having a tool to take screenshots of players screens etc.), it’s all about the dedication and effort you put into it and trying to be the best. At Ikov they had one simple principle if you joined the team. “There is no second place.”

And that’s where we differ from, we listen to our players and try to create something that is theirs.

Everyone has their own thoughts about it, I guess i’ll just have to follow mine together with my team.

Read full topic

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
item.dc:creator: @Avarrocka_PS Avarrocka PS
item.description:
@Avarrocka_PS wrote:

Since i’m not allowed to double post here are the update of today (03-01-2015)

Since i’ve added an attribute system, I could finally make the make-x options work. While I was at it I got to complete Ore smelting for smithing and the packet is being utilized for it together with fletching.

Here’s some media. (Beaver stand/walk anims are wrong we’ll be fixing it soon)

LsSKj0N.gif762×523

MJDMher.gif761×524

Miss Silabsoft:

Why did you create a new account Artem?

I’m not Artem.

[quote=“Ryley, post:9, topic:554256”]Pretty sure every Avarrocka after the first one was “the comeback”. The name is tainted, using it will only get you flame.

However, best of luck. I suppose.

Unsure how you’re going to get this out in 20 days with what appears to be a good chunk of game content to write (judging from all of the red text in your todo list.)[/quote]

All of the crucial things are already done, we’ve got full clipping (We’ve used your file-store system but improved it to be faster), combat is already done since it came with the base we’re using (Asteria 3.0) most parts are red but they just need a rework / test but they are already added. For the minigames, we’ll only be finishing 2 of them before we host, it’s better to start small so you can keep the community updated time-to-time instead of finishing everything and hosting the server. Because that way you simply can’t.

Thanks for the blessings nonetheless. Avarrocka might have a bad name, but we will do our best to make it good again.

@on-topic

I’ve added the statement dialogue and we’re glad that we’ve finished our first non-combatant familiar, this one cannot fight with you and cannot be attacked anywhere in the world, it can forage herbs (This happens very, very rare) and it has the Remote-view ability (This is not done yet since I can’t figure how to work with the camera packet >.>). Here’s a gif.

rVRYo22.gif?1762×524

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
item.dc:creator: @Avarrocka_PS Avarrocka PS
item.description:
@Avarrocka_PS wrote:

I didn’t write the client features, however i’m not here to discuss things with you. I just wanted to let these awesome people know this server is coming out soon. I didn’t state the summoning features directly on the thread because its not a skill which only has like 5 features, it’s pretty broad. I didn’t mean to start a fight with you but it just pisses me off when someone hops on to a thread to just spread negativity. If you read the top of the thread you can be redirected to the page which contains all the summoning updates, once i’ve found time ill update the @op.

For now here are some updates. Keep in mind the system is very flexible and has support for a lot of things which others servers couldn’t do without adding hundreds of lines.

Finished beast of burdens and added a nice attributes system, the npc dialogues aren't bugged, i'm just sending the wrong animations because I don't have the correct ones. Here are some gifs :p

[SPOILER=Media]

b0NjCne.gif763×524

Don’t mind the spirit spider shouting, it basically does that if it fails to drop eggs, and it kept shouting because I decreased the spawn rate for the gif.

zv0Opb7.gif761×525

I kept clicking but it wouldn’t display the third dialogue.

w7Mn52T.gif764×525

[/SPOILER]

Todays updates:

[ul][]Completed all familiars upto Beaver (Ability types are added but passive ones such as the desert wyrm mining a rock or beaver cutting a tree hasn’t been done yet)
[]All the familiars which have been added have their respective forager / beast of burden ability.
[]If you use an empty bucket on a compost mound it’ll give you compost and hit the compost mound for 2 or 20 damage depending on the settings ur on.
[]The granite crab will only forage cod and pike if you’re fishing.
[]Can use a beaver as knife when you try to fletch, just use the specified log on him.
[]Familiars are now saved when you log out and they will re-summon when u log back in accordingly to their respective timers, health and storage if they had one.
[*]We’ve fixed a problem we had with our client when we added 667 identikits, the “toolkits” wouldn’t show when doing certain animations.[/ul]

[SPOILER=Toolkits media]



[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Summoning]


[/SPOILER]

Todays updates, Finished the teleport ability types, it has support for teleporting away while in combat and your hitpoints are below the specified amount. I also started on the remote view ability so that will be done very soon.

[SPOILER=Media]

mKbsGQw.gif758×522
[/SPOILER]

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Avarrocka PS, post:5, topic:554256”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=673180.msg4501671#msg4501671 date=1451609902]
Can’t wait to see how long it takes before this one fails too.
[/quote]

You don’t know a thing, the development team has changed quite a bit, we’ve managed to push some awesome Client as Server updates that i’ve not seen before, just take our agility system for example, never have I ever seen advanced courses perfected up until the delays. Here’s another example, our summoning, never have I ever seen a server having better summoning then what Runique has, but let me tell you something. Our summoning system is already more modular and flexible then what they have, for instance many familiars have their respective passive as non-passive ability, the beaver can be used as a knife when fletching, the granite crab will only forage all it’s items when it’s fishing and will only give experience for every 2 item it collects (These are just random ones of the many we’ve already added) besides that everything in the server is documentated.

Client features you ask? Have you ever seen Anti-aliasing, mipmapping, perfect 667 identikits (Keeping in mind these work with our dialogues none of them have black triangles or purple colours), resizable / fullscreen with ALL the gameframes working on a client? That’s a bummer isn’t it but let me tell you something, we already have it and that’s not even all.

So next time atleast read the thread before you start judging, we’re close to hosting and the server will be up before the 20th of January.

Take your negativaty somewhere else. Thank you very much.[/quote]
You act just like artem. He had so many plans to host the server, too. But what happen to that? Oh, I know. He kept changing bases every time there was a problem with it.
Youtube vid - Look “Coming soon”… Lol.
Oh, and I have read the thread. (Considering half the thread is a rip from the old one) Maybe you shouldn’t assume things.
Also, did you write the client features? Unless you’re artem, I highly doubt it as that was (supposedly) all his work.
Lastly, you don’t mention summoning anywhere in the thread except for your reply to me, or in the update log. Methinks if it’s “so good” you’d take the 5 minutes to add it in with the rest of your skill list.

item.title: [Asteria 3.0] Avarrocka - The comeback!
item.dc:creator: @Avarrocka_PS Avarrocka PS
item.description:
@Avarrocka_PS wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Base: Asteria 3.0 | Original Avarrocka Client.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#ab7e5b]Our forums have been released, feel free to [/COLOR]check it out!

To view all the updates that have been made until now i’d urge you to view this thread;
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/611462-asteria-3-0-avarrocka-comeback.html

[HR]

[table][tr][td]
[LEFT][size=3]
Journey to the world of Avarrocka! Avarrocka is a 317 RSPS that is packed with high quality content. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE encounters that helps foster our player-driven economy. Avarrocka can simply be defined as ‘unique’. For example we have a guild system that is truly meaningful and rewarding. The concept surrounding Avarrocka is one of a kind and the design (down to the smallest details) is incredible.[/size][/LEFT][/td][/tr][/table]

[LEFT][size=3]
At Avarrocka we strive to deliver uniquely distinct & diverse content. We’re constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with unique content of the highest quality. Our outstanding staff team will quickly amend any issue you may have on your adventures.[/size][/LEFT]

[LEFT][size=3]
We are consistently adding improvements to Avarrocka, so that it can be the best and most modified, yet stable server in existence. We’re also much more inclusive than your average online destination. Avarrocka is for gamers of every breed; new members are the fiber that binds our community, so we welcome them warmly! Our focus is around our members, and the staff team works tirelessly to ensure that everyone enjoys their experience.[/size][/LEFT]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=#ab7e5b][FONT=Georgia]I remember the way. I go north to go south, east to go west, back to go forward. And to touch the light I have to pass beneath the shadow of true destiny.[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[HR]

[table][tr][td]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Development keys:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

[ul][][COLOR=#FF0000]Hasn’t been started[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#FFD700]Currently in progress[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#00FF00]Finished[/COLOR][/ul]
[/td][/tr][/table]

[SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Development team:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

[ul][][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Chris - Game Developer[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Stan - Game Developer[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Jay - Game Developer[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Artem - Credits[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Dennis - Web Developer[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Rob - Assistant Developer[/COLOR][/ul]

[SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Community team:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

[ul][][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Royal - Community Manager.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Seppe - Administrator.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Matt - Administrator.[/COLOR][/ul]

[SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Goal:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#ab7e5b]At Avarrocka we strive to deliver uniquely distinct & diverse content. We’re constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our unique and friendly community with unique content of the highest quality. Our outstanding staff team will quickly amend any issue you may have on your adventures.[/COLOR]

[HR]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=#ab7e5b]Official Development Log:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

* Avarrocka project resumed.
* Added new texture system.
* Fixed model decoder.
* Added model texturing.
* Fixed a client networking issue.
* Finished converting the commands to java.
* Addded support for producing/deducting multiple items when using the producing skill action class. Completed the process for creating finished and unfinished potions.
* Increased the delay formula for the potion creation classes. Added an animation command. Completed herb identifying.
* Added support for usergroups and redone the commands pattern. Not finished converting the commands though.
* Added compability to connect to the Avarrocka client.
* Fixed the user groups and added a new commands system which has a proper dispatcher and skeleton classes for further utilization. This works properly with the user groups.
* Converted all the commands to the new command system.
* Minor improvements to the command dispatcher. 
* Implemented a server sided file system.
* Implemented a server sided file system(update).
* Added the missing utilities for the file system io. 
* Started on object definition and object definition parser.
* Added a file system bootstrap to the game builder. 
* Added the bzip2 library.
* Added the forced movement mask and fixed an issue with item spawning.
* Start of the Agility system, needs testing and fixing for obstacle types.
* Added the wilderness jump and fixed a small issue with the forced movement mask.
* Implemented the old forced movement class from wildercress so it can be fixed properly.
* Finished herblore creation of unfinished and finished potions.
* Fixed problems with the producing skill action and fixed issues with creating potions and added tar creation.
* Start on woodcutting.
* Further continuation on woodcutting.
* Finished woodcutting.
* Start on mining.
* Added the huge cache to the data folder.
* Implementation of: 
[LIST]
[*] Region system(only for object now).
[*] Traversal map system.
[*] Pathfinding (with three pathfinders).
[*] Player following clipped.
[/LIST]
* Reformatted all the classes. 
* Finished mining.
* Finished runecrafting.
* Finished grindable items.
* Start on fishing.
* Updates regarding prayer, wc, mining, fishing and items.
* Fixed error regarding prayer bone altar.
* Mining adjustments.
* New hitmarks with critical hit support.
* Minor fixes.
* Moved the forced movement class, some design updates made to the forced movement class.
* Agility system design completed.
* Support for higher revision identikit.
* Agility updates. 
* Design fixes regarding agility.
* Added sound command for testing and fixed accepting appearances.
* Further progression on agility.
* New agility design system.
* Added a few new commands.
* Further improvement on the agility design.
* Added a Cancel Policy for skills which will take care of interactions while skilling.
* Fixed Minimap clicking.
* Heights fix.
* Agility updates, completed gnome agility course, start on barbarian course.
* Obstacle failing is more modular now, I've fixed the issue with forced movements on obstacle actions.
* Further continuation on barbarian course.
* Some changes to the agility system and completed the barbarian agility course.
* Restarted writing agility.. (again)
* Finished the Agility System, completed Gnome agility course.
* Further continuation on the agility system, completed advanced gnome agility course except the pole swing because it's too damn complicated.
* Renamed the agility class, modifactions to forced movement.
* Started on the barbarian outpost agility course.
* Completed Barbarian outpost agility course.
* Fixed issue with Crumbling walls, and rewrote a message.
* Finished advanced barb courses, start on wilderness course.
* Added lare's fishing..
* Fixed the run-up wall for barb course.
* Finished Wilderness Course except the last obstacle because animation is buggy (model precision?).
* Added firemaking, fixed herblore and added a new utility method for skill actions.
* Skill actions now support animations which are executed instantly rather then periodically.
* Home button teleport has been added.
* Firemaking delay fix and fix for walking west.
* Started on a thieving system, completed thieving from stalls.
* Item on item fix, added thieving stalls and pickpocketing.
* Moved the fight caves classes.
* Added support for spawning npcs for player.
* Added the pole swing to the advanced gnome course. 
* Started on barrows and added an utility for item sets.
* Added support for digging, further continuation on barrows.
* Moved drop and pickup sounds to the correct classes. 
* Removed old pickup/drop sounds. 
* Extended skills support to dungeoneering, summoning, hunter and farming. 
* Skilling adjustements, new Priority flag for skilling.
* Finished fletching.
* Fixed agility checks.
* Fixed the cancel policy's for skills.
* Fixes for item on item skills, finished fletching, only bolt creating is left.
* Fletching fixes.
* Added running.
